name: mikroe.click.i2c1wire2
short_description: I2C 1-Wire 2 Click is a compact add-on board bridging I2C master interfaces with 1-Wire slave devices, ideal for simplifying complex communication protocols. This board features the DS2485, an advanced 1-Wire master with memory from Analog Devices. It features adjustable internal timers for precise 1-Wire signal management, relieving the host processor of timing-sensitive operations, and supports standard and overdrive communication speeds.
